description: Adds a workload to a component. Each component can have at most five workloads.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: WorkloadConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration settings of the workload. The value is the escaped JSON of the configuration. WorkloadName (string) --- The name of the workload. Tier (string) --- The configuration of the workload tier. Configuration (string) --- The configuration settings of the workload.

nested_params.name: Tier
nested_params.description: The configuration of the workload tier.

nested_params.name: Configuration
nested_params.description: The configuration settings of the workload.

nested_items.name: WorkloadConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings of the workload. The value is the escaped JSON of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Tier
nested_items.description: The configuration of the workload tier.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings of the workload.
